generalInformation: Very popular cocktail tomato, approximately 4 cm in diameter, with a delightful taste. Each fruit weighs approximately 30 grams. Best grown in a greenhouse.
preCultivation: Sow indoors in seed soil, shallowly. Sprouts after about 10 days at around 20 degrees Celsius. High germination temperature is important. Transplant into pots with potting soil. Tie up the plants and remove side shoots in the leaf axils. Fertilize and water thoroughly to increase the chances of large yields.
